resources.string:
In this demo application you can trigger the debug menu at any time by tapping on the Beagle logo in the bottom-right corner.

The following sections provide some guidance with setting up the library while the rest of the app serves as a demo / showcase for the built-in feature set.
The library offers five variants that display the debug menu in different ways. The next step is selecting the one that fits your application\'s needs the most (the current build uses View)â€¦
